title: Maverick
description: She’d do anything for her family.But I want her to do me.Gabby is fire—wild, untamed, and too damn tempting.I should keep my distance. I know getting too close means getting burned.But I’ve never been one to play it safe.She thinks I’m a joke, the lunatic of the club.But I’m crazy about her.And I don’t care if I have to defy her father, her family, or start a war—She belongs with me.And I’ll do whatever it takes to make her mine.Maverick (The Black Hornets MC #2) is a dark, steamy motorcycle club romance with forbidden love, high stakes, and a reckless antihero who will break every rule to claim the woman he craves.
author: Savannah Rylan
